item.title: Node.js
item.description: You can monitor your Node.js-based applications using the Linux Agent and Metricly StatsD server. All it takes is installing our agent and instrumenting your custom metrics, and then youâ€™ll be visualizing the performance of your Node.js applications. Prerequisites Linux Agent Configure Navigate to the netuitive-agent.conf file Update statsd to enabled = True. # local statsd server [[[statsd]]] enabled = True 3. Ensure Node.js is installed properly using the node command.
